actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President appoint a bipartisan Commission to study the trade deficit and related problems.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should appoint a bipartisan committee to make a full study of the U.S. trade deficit and related problems and to report to the President on the findings of such study within six months.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President appoint a bipartisan Commission to study the trade deficit and related problems.
